thread.section_title: iQ Hotel Roma - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Best Hotel in Rome
thread.title_full: Best Hotel in Rome - Review of iQ Hotel Roma, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: ShalDara
title: Best Hotel in Rome
text:
My family really enjoyed our stay at iQ Hotel Roma. Wonderful staff, fantastic facilities, comfortable rooms, great location and well priced.
We stayed here twice for 7 days.
The food is also excellent and well priced. To be honest we couldn't find a better deal in Rome.
I would definitely stay here again. We stayed in other hotels in Italy but this was our favourite. Highly recommended. Thank you to the staff at iQ Hotel Roma for your friendly welcome to us and for always being very helpful.
